title: Backlash over under-16s social media ban
description: As the nationwide social media ban for under-16s looms, the Babic family says the change threatens their livelihood and their right to parent their own way. Catch the full story on 7NEWS tonight at 6. #socialmedia #ban #under16ban #socialmediaban #meta

title: January 6 pipe bomb suspect arrested
description: The FBI has arrested a man for allegedly planting two pipe bombs the day before the January 6 Capital riots in Washington DC in 2021. #capitalriots #washingtondc #arrest #police #usa

title: Vatican rejects bid for women to be deacons
description: The Vatican has ruled against a bid that would allow women to serve as deacons in the Catholic church. #vatican #catholic #deacons #priest #rome

title: Shots fired at shopping centre in Gregory Hills, Sydney
description: Police have swarmed to Gregory Hills in Sydneyâ€™s southwest after a reported shooting at a shopping centre. #gregoryhills #sydney #sydneycrime #nswpolice

title: Man fights for life after Logan shooting | 7NEWS
description: A man is fighting for life after being shot inside a home in Slacks Creek, Logan, south of Brisbane at 1:15am. Police are conducting a manhunt for the gunman, with the incident appearing to be a targeted attack on what neighbours describe as a normally quiet street. title: Australia's under-16 social media ban begins | 7NEWS
description: Australia's social media ban for users under 16 takes effect in five days, with Meta already shutting down underage accounts on Facebook, Instagram and Threads. High school students express mixed reactions about the ban, with some relieved about protection from harmful content and bullying, while others worry about losing connections to online communities and hobbies. Students are already exploring workarounds and alternative platforms not covered by the current legislation. title: New defence drone devices trialled in South Australia
description: 7NEWS has been given a first-hand look new defence technology to help keep Australians safe. New drone busting devices could be ready for action at the Brisbane Olympic Games in 2032. #drone #defence #tech #SouthAustralia

title: How withdrawing from social media could affect Australia's teens
description: Australia's teens are facing withdrawal symptoms including irritability, anger, and frustration when the under-16 social media ban begins next week. See the full story on 7NEWS.com.au #socialmedia #socialmediaban #kids #teens #psychology

title: Sydney swelters in 40-degree heatwave | 7NEWS
description: Sydney is experiencing a heatwave with temperatures reaching up to 40 degrees Celsius in western areas including Penrith, Parramatta and Camden. The extreme heat is expected to continue for several days before a cool change brings temperatures back to the mid-20s by Sunday. Paramedics are urging residents to stay hydrated, seek shade, and check on vulnerable community members including the elderly and those with medical conditions. title: Drunk raccoon passes out after breaking into Virginia liquor store
description: A raccoon has become drunk and passed out after breaking into a liquor store in Virginia in the US. The masked bandit was found a little worse for wear, according to one of the officers who responded to the call. #raccoon #robbery #liquorstore #animals #virginia

title: Giant chicken prank leaves his boss stunned
description: Is this the most elaborate workplace prank? A Sunshine Coast towie gave his boss quite the shock after dumping a giant chicken in his carpark. Sam Hughes hauled the chook all the way from Brisbane to Nambour. #Prank #GiantChicken #Boss #Australia #Queensland

title: Urgent recall for several batches of Cancer Council kids sunscreen
description: An urgent recall notice has been issued for Cancer Council Sunscreen Clear Zinc Kids SPF50+. Three batches of the sunscreen (1143730, 1141313 and 1146857) have been recalled over fears the contents of the sunscreen could become separated, with consumers warned to â€œnot use itâ€. #sunscreen #sunprotection #recall #cancercouncil #accc
